description: Tommy's a filthy guy. You know this and we know this. But, just because he has a dirty mind, doesn't mean he isn't into keeping himself clean and smelling good. That's what the bath is for!Our favorite hunk strips down, jumps in the suds and, well, gets distracted and instead of washing himself off, he begins playing with his beautiful cock! What's not to love about that???Enjoy!
title: Bathtub Bonanza
